sources.description:
It's Friday @PizzaFLIX

Tonight, it‚Äôs a see-it-to-believe-it spectacle from the legendary CECIL B. DEMILLE‚Äîhis first all-talking production and his MGM debut! This EXPLOSIVE mash-up of Rom-Com, Melodrama, and Disaster flick features a coal miner on death row, a bratty heiress desperate for a quick husband, her socialite lover, and his naughty wife‚Äîjuggling more affairs than she can count! Brimming with all the loose morals you‚Äôd expect from Pre-Code Hollywood, this is one wild ride you don‚Äôt want to miss!

Directed by Cecil B. DeMille and written by Jeanie Macpherson, Dynamite showcases DeMille‚Äôs signature lavish production design and gripping storytelling. Fans of Golden Age Hollywood, Pre-Code cinema, and early talkies will love this rare treasure from the PizzaFLIX vault.
